name: BallBlaster
description:
A personal project using various methods from different tutorials I have done.

A block breaker game with paddle and ball and blocks to break with a time limit and blocks that will respawn endlessly.
Some block drop bonuses such as ammo and time increase and multiplier for score when blocks are broken.
Once all blocks are blasted a new ball is spawned along with a new set of blocks to blast.
The new ball can be shot to be destroyed but if it hits the paddle it will deduct time from your time limit.

This game is still under development and more features will be included such as an online score menu so players can have high scores to compete against and new unique drops.
I will appreciate any feedback and bugs and even ideas for improvements.
I'm a very dull person when it comes to colors so the UI is gonna take some time> Ideas will be very much appreciated though.

For now this is mostly for testing purposes, whether it's fun to play and what works and what doesn't etc.

Things that are still in the works:
Ui improvements such as popups for bonus scores and what bonus is currently activated.
More music and a proper menu for controlling music and sounds, also looking at how to include players own music if possible.
Many graphic changes, vfx and assets.

Looking at making different types of levels but for now want to make sure everything runs perfect before expanding.
